amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Recurrent authorization to operate; form; contents.
amendatorysection.para: A recurrent authorization to operate shall be in a form approved by the commission and shall state in a clear and conspicuous manner at least the following information:
(1) The date of issuance, effective date, and term of the authorization to operate;
(2) The full and correct name and address of the institution authorized to operate;
(3) The authority for authorization to operate and the conditions thereof; and
(4) Any limitation of authorization to operate as deemed necessary by the commission.
